title: Area NKY high school football schedule for Oct. 2
text:
Area NKY high school football schedule for Oct. 2 
Updated: Thu, Oct 01 2015, 11:08 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- Here is a look at the high school football schedule involving area Kentucky teams for Oct. 2 (note all times 7 p.m. unless noted and games are in alphabetical order by home team) and for updated scores throughout the night go here on a desktop and scroll down to the ScoreStream scoreboard ( here is a link to this week's Kentucky AP state polls ): 
FRIDAY'S GAMES 
Gallatin County at Carroll County, 7:30 p.m.Owen County at Walton-Verona, 7:30 p.m. 
CLASS 4A, DISTRICT 7 Bourbon County at Mason County, 7:30 p.m.Harrison County at Scott, 7:30 p.m. 
NON-DISTRICT Newport at Beechwood, 7:30 p.m. Dixie Heights at Cooper, 7:30 p.m.George Rogers Clark at Ryle, 7:30 p.m.Bethlehem at Holy Cross, 7:30 p.m.Pendleton County at Lewis CountyConner at Lloyd 
Paris 52, Bracken County 0 
Follow us on Twitter @Local12 and LIKE us on Facebook for updates! 
To get "The Skinny" on local sports be sure to follow Local12 Digital Sports Columnist/Editor Richard Skinner on Twitter @Local12Skinny and LIKE him on Facebook for updates or email him raskinner@sbgtv.com. Related Stories Entertainment News
